name: Up Down
description:
This game is my submission to Farewell North - Community Jam 2. The theme was Upside Down so i created this game, and its made within 14 hours that means the last day of the jam, so it might be crappy but it still fun to play. The game is simple, Camera turns upside down after every 6 seconds and you have to survive as long as you can.

How i made this game?

Well i use buildbox for this game as i create most of the games in it.

Credits

Assets by: Kenney

Music By : Me

SFX by: Also me

Thanks for trying if you tried!!!
